"Write a children's book about a rubber duck who learns to overcome his fear of water."
"Create a music video where a group of people dress up as rubber ducks and perform a dance routine inspired by the song 'Can't Hold Us' by Macklemore & Ryan Lewis."
"Design an app that uses augmented reality to turn your smartphone into a virtual rubber duck."
"Host a charity event where participants dress up as rubber ducks and race down a river."
"Create a series of funny and silly videos featuring rubber ducks in everyday situations."
